input.activity_signal: Company website found via web search showing current product offerings (IP5000-XL PBX for up to 500 users, IP1200-XL unified communications system). Third-party reviews describe IPitomy as "a premier VoIP provider" with "highly resilient VoIP telecommunications network." Multiple dealer/reseller sites (srqphones.com, aerocominc.com) actively list IPitomy products, indicating ongoing business operations.
input.product_summary: IPitomy provides IP PBX systems and unified communications solutions, offering business phone systems ranging from small office to enterprise scale (up to 500 users), with VoIP telecommunications network services.
